page.title: 13Davenham School
page.content: Education in the village is provided at Davenham Primary School, It was built in 1856. It hasn't got a very big playground or many facilities. There is difficulty in getting from one classroom to another that is why we are having a new school. It is going to be started in 1987 to 1988. The number of pupils in the old school has fallen from 200 to 180. The new school will be a primary school with a 1 form entry, it will have 7 classes. It will be a modern building with more space and more school facilities. Better facilities will include art and craft areas. It will have space for science, music etc. It will have a field attached with shrubs and a garden. The new school will have a kitchen. The old school will probably become a day centre.
